entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • stackSize override is not correct value format #60762
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #60760
  • Add UseKestrel() API to the WebApplicationFactory #60758
  • Logout stuck in Processing logout callback #60756
  • Global helpers #60755
  • Simulate Browser Back Button in Blazor #60754
  • Query around augmenting and verifying claims in Blazor Server #60749
  • I am having trouble migrating Blazor WASM SPA project to component rendering ( mix between wasm and server render) #60748
  • Proposal: Enhancing Component Visibility in Blazor #60747

Closed

  • Decouple WebApplicationFactory from TestServer implementation #60370
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, httpsys-encoded-url, json #60739
  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries #60741
  • Title can not be empty #60759
  • SignInAsync doesn't call SignInOrTwoFactorAsync #60712
  • Incorrect OpenAPI document generation with recursive object that contains a list #60012
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #60732
  • Quarantine `VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues` and `EventCountersAndMetricsValues` #57259
    .NET 10 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Updated to vs 17.13 to align with xcopy-msbuild #60763
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update to Microsoft.OpenApi v2.0.0-preview.11 #60761
    area-infrastructure
  • Add `NotFound` method in `NavigationManager` for interactive and static rendering #60752
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Opt-in to use dotnet.boot.js #60751
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3

Merged

  • Add location.reload on rejected Blazor reconnection to ReconnectModal… #60753
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview3
  • Unquarantine EventCountersAndMetricsValues and VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues #60651
    area-networking, 10.0-preview3
  • Update Selenium versions #60744
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Check length of TypeArguments before accessing via index #60742
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • Fix self-referential schema handling in collection schemas #60410
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.x
  • Enable static code analysis pilot in pipeline #60743
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2656139 #60736
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2b6b042` to `7218908` #60664
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Flow the WebAssembly options from Server to client through SSR marker #60714
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #60675
    area-mvc
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25122.1 #60564
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview3

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Extensions: use speakable implementation names #9195

Updated

  • Collection expression arguments: open questions #9158
  • Add proposal for ignored directives #9192

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet-ef migrations script` omits required `GO` separators in EF Core 9, causing SQL batch errors #35731
  • SQL Server: Consider introducing EF and its version into the connection string's Application Name #35730
    Backlog
  • Support the new RETURNING clause in JSON_VALUE() in the upcoming SQL Server 2025 #35729
    10.0.0
  • EF Core concurrency issues when interacting with table that have after triggers. #35728
  • TPC returns incorrect items when using generic entities #35727

Closed

  • OrderBy on subquery is elided #35705
  • References to dropped columns in custom migrations #35677

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35719
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Navigation test refactoring - improving structure for scenarios that don't support collections #35711
  • Redact constants that get inlined from variables into query in log #35724

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide more customization features for BlazorWebView & HybridWebView #28202
    .NET 10 Planning
  • NavigationPage.TitleView causes memory leak with PopToRootAsync #28201
  • [Testing] Write Tests for Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android #28116 #28198
  • .NET 9 iOS crashing on device in release mode at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunContinuations #28197
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #28191
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Sometimes the step to install Appium on CI fails #28190
    Backlog
  • [iOS] refreshview, missing refresh indicator when triggered in Page.OnAppearing() #28188
    Backlog
  • .Net 9 MAUI MacCatalyst Desktop Shell App TabBar shows "MORE" when > 5 items #28184
  • .NET 9 and MAUI no longer working with ComputerVisionClient #28182
  • Labels with Padding are truncated on IOS #28180
    Backlog
  • Incorrect sender for TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped in Span.GestureRecognizers #28176
    Backlog
  • API to determine if Large Fonts are in use on the device. #28174

Closed

  • There is an error when building ManualMaui project using the latest Maui nightly version. #28097
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS][Editor] Editor that gets focus will scroll the text content inside the Editor, when it resides inside a CollectionView that has a Footer #27766
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • The border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows only #28153
  • Changing Translation of an element causes Maui in iOS to constantly run Measure & ArrangeChildren (likely cause of brutal iOS Layout performance issues) #24996
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] RefreshView Loading Indicator Stuck with CollectionView #28169
  • Reenable `BindingUpdatesFromInteractiveRefresh` UI Test #28178
  • New HorizontalTextAlignment.Justify doesn't work on android devices #27166
    Backlog
  • PanGestureRecognizer is not working as expected in Windows #28175
  • PanGestureRecognizer on Windows stops working when leaving View #20397
    Backlog
  • Pan Gesture Stops Working in .NET MAUI After Pinch Gesture #25342
    Backlog
  • why it run well in debug mode, but not in release mode #28168
  • Voiceover is not announcing about the "Name", "Description" and "Category" label along with the respective fields:A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Screen reader #27431
    .NET 9 SR5
  • No name and role are defined for "Icons" present in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Name Role Value #27432
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Voiceover is not announcing as selected/ unselected for Tags and Icons: A11y_.NET 9 template_Project_Screen reader #27460
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Voiceover is not announcing "Projects" and "Tasks" as heading.: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Screen reader #27462
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Voiceover is not announcing the status messages "Tag saved" and "Tag deleted.": A11y_.NET 9 template_ManageMeta_ScreenReader #27463
    .NET 9 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [Android] Android: Native View not set exception on modal page - fix #28200
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • Fix/workaround iOS stuck device tests #28196
    community ✨
  • Made sudo optional for Linux jdk provisioning #28195
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [CollectionView] Crash occurs when switching CollectionView.IsVisible right after setting ItemsSource #28194
    p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 5 #28193
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [test] Run Android device tests on linux #28192
  • Revert "Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar" #28189
    p/0, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android, iOS] - Flyout icon should remain visible when a page is pushed onto a NavigationPage or Shell page with the back button disabled. #28187
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed SearchHandler Keyboard does not dismiss when unfocus #28186
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Implement iOS secondary ToolbarItems #28185
    t/breaking 💥, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Testing] Allow to use Theme changes actions on Catalyst #28181
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement methods to manage alerts from UITests on Windows #28177
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix the bounce in iOS Keyboard Scrolling with Editors #28173
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor

Merged

  • [Bindings SG] Filter out false positive Binding.Create matches #28138
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [android] add AOT profile for `dotnet new maui -sc` #28172
    platform/android 🤖, delighter, t/perf
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Merge preview 2 and main changes #28183
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Start shipping WorkloadDependencies.json #28149
  • Improve the performance of provisioning and running of device tests #28065
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • 2025-3-3-docs-UiTesting.md-improvements #28143
    area-docs, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #27970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 4 #28137
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android #28116
    p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    p/0, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Crashing issue with keyboard scrolling iOS #28148
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • Adding some copilot instructions #27864
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: TapGestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • [Android] Set FillViewport to true to MauiHorizontalScrollView #26904
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR5
  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
  • [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #27502
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5

    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS & Android] Fix: RadioButton Focused and Unfocused Events Not Firing. #28164
    community ✨
  • [.Net10] [Proposal] [iOS] TabbedPage.AutoResizeIconsProperty #28046
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 3 #28103
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Doesn't navigate to function definitions, it decompiles code instead #77435
    Backlog

Closed

  • In C# 7.3, Introduce local for 'new xxx' can put CS8370 #77428
  • "Remove async modifier" removes comments #77434
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35905.05 #77432
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Collections.Immutable #77414
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.d18initial-10404.01 #77427
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35904.92 #77426

PullRequests

Created

  • Update null-conditional-assignment branch from main #77449
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add stubs for semantic model apis needed by IDE #77448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update dev18 target branch #77443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add named parameters in the completion list for with(...) elements #77447
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77446
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Configure main-vs-deps #77408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add signature help for `with(...)` element in a collection expression. #77442
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Small cleanup in the packages and editor factories #77439
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump BCL references to 9.0 #76890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77441
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, untriaged
  • Auto merge PRs instead of just applying a label to them #77438
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Don't use an implicit-object if the lang version doesn't support it #77437
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix bot name #77436
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77409
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge feature 'partial events and constructors' to main #77410
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors, Next

Updated

  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `libnethost.lib` contains LTCG objects again #113183
  • Deprecate or analyzer-warn HttpClient IsSuccessStatusCode and EnsureSuccessStatusCode #113177
  • regression net9.0 ServicePoint throws PNSE on browser #113174
  • ASP.NET Core - Getting model attribute parameter with attributes always crashes with invalid cast exception #113173
  • Add new COM interface provided by test host to support cDAC #113168
  • Suggested solution to SYSLIB1054 results in compiler error CS8796 #113162
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.2.25126.21] Autodesk Revit 2025 pop up error report when opening a ".rvt" file. #113158
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.2.25126.21] Autodesk Revit 2025 pop up error window when opening Dynamo #113157
  • double.ToString(string) missing digit using scientific notation #113155
  • LdapConnection causes an NullReferenceException when authenticating with Authentication type external and a client certificate #113154
  • Seek(0, SeekOrigin.End) does not work as expected on Linux block devices (always returns 0). #113152
  • System.Security.Cryptography.DES.CreateDecryptor() crash on android #113149
  • SocketsHttpHandler retries with useless "Authorization" header when SystemNetworkCredential is in use #113145

Closed

  • [Uri] Uri(String, UriKind) throws IndexOutOfRangeException for certain inputs #1487
  • Crash at Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceCollectionContainerBuilderExtensions.BuildServiceProvider(IServiceCollection services, ServiceProviderOptions options) #113103
  • Blazor WASM AOT - Error encountered during app startup after AOT compilation #98636
    10.0.0
  • Sve: *FirstFaulting* are mostly failing in gcstress runs #112463
    10.0.0
  • Design cDAC level API to expose stack walking #111734
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/Cmn/Cmn.cmd #113051
  • paltests build on CI #113063
    10.0.0
  • Bug? Paring error of \number #113144
  • I can't bypass the System.ArgumentException: '.NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON." #113156
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json Provide option make me can disable [JsonPropertyName] and [JsonIgnore] #113148
  • Bug? Parsing error of Numbered Backreferences #113143

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Add missing ScenarioArgs to the android device startup test runs #113182
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • [10.0/preview-2] JIT: disable array stack allocation #113181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build breaks #113179
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Support bitwise field insertions for return registers #113178
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consume libraries that we vendor fully by building separately and using a custom prefix path #113176
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: Fix Lowering::LowerRange #113172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle relative path loading on non-Windows for AppContext.BaseDirectory on NativeAOT #113171
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Opt the area-codegen-coreclr label out of automated issue cleanup #113170
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • Establish runtime-diagnostics pipeline #113169
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix encoding missed overridden properties #113167
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 10.0.0
  • Tensor.Slice No Longer Copies #113166
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add AggressiveOptimization to Number.FormatBigInteger #113165
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] Read application environment during build & publish from MSBuild pro #113164
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • fix: correct ArgumentException formatting in NativeAOT #113016 #113163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasmDiffable #113161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable FEATURE_RX_THUNKS on Windows #113160
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Update MsQuic library version #113159
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/9.0-staging] Use invariant culture when formatting transfer capture in regex source generator (#113081) #113150
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.x
  • Add SymmetricAlgorithm.SetKey(ROSpan) #113146
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Cached interface dispatch for coreclr #111771
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Check for an empty string for the TimeZoneDirectory environment variable #112831
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • Fix Sve test templates to avoid buffer overrun #113113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Include PDB for all TfmRuntimeSpecificPackageFile #112140
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.15
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use invariant culture when formatting transfer capture in regex source generator #113151
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.x
  • Fix test failure from #113051 #113128
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Remove [Experimental] #113021
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 10.0.0
  • Fix a debug-assert in assertionprop.cpp #113147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use TryGetRangeFromAssertions to fold more relops in global assert prop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix TensorPrimitives.MultiplyAddEstimate for integers #113094
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.4

Updated

  • Seed in the skeleton of ML-DSA based on current prototyping #112891
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Stack walk support more Frame types #112997
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Doc fixes for .NET 10 Preview 1 update #113027
    needs-area-label
  • Bump rollup from 4.18.0 to 4.34.9 in /src/mono/browser/runtime #113129
    area-Infrastructure-mono, javascript
  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift language features] Add equality comparison for Swift Structs #3029

PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift Bindings] Initialized static properties support #3028
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Start running the wasi library tests #3027

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow pinned SDK to be used for dotnet format command #47282
  • C# Android App - take photo without condirmation button #47280
  • File conflict when pack packages on Github Actions dotnet 10 preview 1 sdk #47269

Closed

  • Failed to install workload via cmd with error "System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'paths') ..." on MacOS #47270
  • [NETE2ESDK][Regression]Deb installer only, installing package dotnet-host-10.0.0-alpha.1.24620.10 is failed. #45624

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish the vertical artifacts in the dotnet "repo project" #47295
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Test SBRP package cleanup #47293
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [main] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.2.25155.1 #47290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change help structure in dotnet test #47288
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Refactor copilot instructions to include specific issue link for Fact… #47281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Fix home calculation Fixes #46821 #47292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Validate while publishing from the VMR #47264
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Go back further to buildartifacts #47267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove "aspnetcoremodule_$(Architecture)_en_v2_..." bundled installer… #47262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify reused artifact download for VMR builds #47268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, Document for new feature, cli-ux
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Move branding information to targets file #47261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable --interactive by default for sessions that are local. #47226
    untriaged, Document for new feature, cli-ux
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    Area-run-file
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, Area-run-file
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Ensure container generation uniformly reports outputs to MSBuild #47234
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Select the NativeAOT runtime pack as the target package when it's provided as part of the KnownILCompilerPack metadata #46611
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47258
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2655858 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
